trait.name: Alien Mind
entries: Si une créature tente de lire les pensées de Belashyrra ou lui inflige des dégâts psychiques, cette créature doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde d'Intelligence {@dc 22} ou être {@condition stunned} pendant 1 minute. La créature {@condition stunned} peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite.

trait.name: Eye Thief
entries: Belashyrra peut voir à travers les yeux de toutes les créatures situées à moins de 120 pieds de lui. Il peut utiliser son rayon oculaire à travers toute créature située à moins de 120 pieds de lui, comme s'il était dans l'espace de cette créature.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Si Belashyrra échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de le réussir à la place.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Belashyrra a un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et autres effets magiques.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Belashyrra regagne 20 points de vie au début de son tour. S'il subit des dégâts radiants, ce trait ne fonctionne pas au début de son prochain tour. Belashyrra ne meurt que si elle commence son tour avec 0 point de vie et ne se régénère pas.

trait.name: Teleport
entries: Comme une action bonus, Belashyrra peut se téléporter jusqu'à 30 pieds dans un espace inoccupé qu'il peut voir.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Belashyrra effectue deux attaques avec ses griffes et utilise son rayon oculaire une fois.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) dégâts tranchants.

action.name: Eye Ray
entries: Belashyrra tire l'un des rayons oculaires magiques suivants de son choix, ciblant une créature qu'il peut voir dans un rayon de 120 pieds autour de lui :

items.name: 1. Psyche-Reconstruction Ray
items.entry: La cible doit effectuer un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 22}, subissant 49 ({@damage 9d10}) dégâts psychiques en cas d'échec, ou la moitié des dégâts en cas de réussite. Si ces dégâts réduisent une créature à 0 point de vie, elle meurt et se transforme en spectateur sous le contrôle de Belashyrra et agit immédiatement après Belashyrra dans l'ordre d'initiative. La cible ne peut être ramenée à sa forme initiale par aucun moyen, à l'exception d'un sort de {@spell wish}.

items.name: 2. Domination Ray
items.entry: La cible doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 22} ou être {@condition charmed} par Belashyrra pendant 1 minute ou jusqu'à ce qu'elle subisse des dégâts. Belashyrra peut donner des ordres télépathiques à la créature {@condition charmed} (aucune action requise), à laquelle elle fait de son mieux pour obéir.

items.name: 3. Mind-Weakening Ray
items.entry: La cible doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde d'Intelligence {@dc 22} ou subir 36 ({@damage 8d8}) dégâts psychiques et être incapable de lancer des sorts ou d'activer des objets magiques pendant 1 minute. La cible peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite.

items.name: 4. Blinding Ray
items.entry: La cible et chaque créature située à moins de 3 mètres d'elle doivent réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Constitution {@dc 22} ou subir 19 ({@damage 3d12}) dégâts radiants et être {@condition blinded} pendant 1 minute. Jusqu'à ce que cette cécité prenne fin, Belyshyrra peut voir à travers les yeux de la {@condition blinded} créature. La créature {@condition blinded} peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: Belashyrra fait une attaque de griffes.

legendary.name: Implant Fear (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Belashyrra cible une créature qu'il peut voir dans un rayon de 60 pieds autour de lui. La cible doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 22} ou subir 22 ({@damage 4d10}) dégâts psychiques et utiliser immédiatement sa réaction, si elle est disponible, pour s'éloigner de Belashyrra aussi loin que sa vitesse le lui permet.

legendary.name: Rend Reality (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Belashyrra déchire les liens de la réalité dans sa zone immédiate. Chaque créature située à moins de 3 mètres de Belashyrra doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Constitution {@dc 22} ou subir 19 ({@damage 3d12}) dégâts de force et gagner un niveau de {@condition exhaustion}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Le chevalier est un lanceur de sorts de 8e niveau. Sa capacité à lancer des sorts est le Charisme (sauvegarde contre les sorts {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} pour toucher avec les attaques de sorts). Il a les sorts de paladin suivants préparés :

trait.name: Commander of Bones
entries: Comme action bonus, le chevalier peut cibler un squelette ou un zombie qu'il peut voir dans un rayon de 30 pieds autour de lui. La cible doit effectuer un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 14}. En cas d'échec, la cible doit obéir aux ordres du chevalier jusqu'à ce que ce dernier meure ou que le chevalier la libère par une action bonus. Le chevalier peut commander jusqu'à douze morts-vivants à la fois de cette manière.

trait.name: Master of the Pallid Banner
entries: Tant que le chevalier se trouve dans un rayon de 60 pieds, tout allié mort-vivant du chevalier bénéficie d'un avantage aux jets de sauvegarde contre tout effet qui transforme les morts-vivants.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le chevalier attaque deux fois avec une de ses armes.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) dégâts tranchants.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} pour toucher, portée 150/600 ft., une cible. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) dégâts perforants.

trait.name: Change Appearance
entries: Le changeant peut utiliser son action pour se polymorpher en un humanoïde moyen qu'il a vu, ou reprendre sa vraie forme. Ses statistiques, autres que sa taille, sont les mêmes sous chaque forme. L'équipement qu'il porte n'est pas transformé. Il revient à sa vraie forme s'il meurt.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le changeant effectue deux attaques avec sa dague.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} pour toucher, portée de 5 ft. ou portée de 20/60 ft., une cible. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) dégâts perforants.

action.name: Unsettling Visage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Chaque créature située dans un rayon de 30 pieds autour du changeur doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 13} ou être {@condition frightened} pendant 1 minute. Une créature peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Le griffon bénéficie d'un avantage sur un jet d'attaque contre une créature si au moins un allié du griffon se trouve à moins de 1,5 mètre de la créature et que l'allié ne l'est pas {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: Si le pied-de-griffe se déplace d'au moins 6 mètres en ligne droite vers une créature et la frappe avec une attaque de griffes dans le même tour, cette cible doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de {@dc 11} de Force ou être assommée {@condition prone}. Si la cible est {@condition prone}, le pied-de-griffe peut effectuer une attaque de morsure contre elle comme action bonus.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le pied-de-griffe effectue deux attaques : une avec sa morsure et une avec ses griffes.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) dégâts perforants.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) dégâts tranchants.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: Si le dolgaunt est soumis à un effet qui lui permet de faire un jet de sauvegarde de Dextérité pour ne subir que la moitié des dégâts, le dolgaunt ne subit à la place aucun dégât s'il réussit son jet de sauvegarde, et seulement la moitié des dégâts s'il échoue. Il ne peut pas utiliser ce trait s'il est {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: Si le dolgaunt ne porte pas d'armure et ne brandit pas de bouclier, sa CA inclut son modificateur de Sagesse.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le dolgaunt effectue deux attaques de tentacules et deux frappes à mains nues. Jusqu'à deux attaques de tentacules peuvent être remplacées par un drain de vitalité.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} pour toucher, portée de 15 ft., une cible. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dégâts de matraquage. La cible est {@condition grappled} (fuite {@dc 12}) si c'est une créature Large ou plus petite. Jusqu'à la fin de ce grappin, le dolgaunt ne peut pas utiliser le même tentacule sur une autre cible. Le dolgaunt possède deux tentacules.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) dégâts de matraquage.

action.name: Vitality Drain
entries: Une créature {@condition grappled} par un tentacule du dolgaunt doit effectuer un jet de sauvegarde de Constitution {@dc 11}. En cas d'échec, la cible subit 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dégâts nécrotiques, et le dolgaunt regagne un nombre de points de vie égal à la moitié des dégâts nécrotiques subis.

trait.name: Dual Consciousness
entries: Le dolgrim a un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre le fait d'être {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, et frappé {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le dolgrim fait trois attaques.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) dégâts perforants.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} pour toucher, portée de 5 ft. ou portée de 20/60 ft., une cible. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) dégâts perforants, ou 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) dégâts perforants si utilisé avec les deux mains pour effectuer une attaque de mêlée.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} pour toucher, portée de 30/120 ft., une cible. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) dégâts perforants.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: La capacité de lanceur de sorts de la sorcière est le Charisme (sauvegarde contre les sorts {@dc 15}). Elle peut lancer de manière innée les sorts suivants, ne nécessitant aucun composant matériel :

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: La sorcière a un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et autres effets magiques.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: La sorcière fait deux attaques au toucher de cauchemar.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) dégâts tranchants.

action.name: Nightmare Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une créature. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) dégâts psychiques. Si la cible est {@condition unconscious}, elle subit 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dégâts psychiques supplémentaires et est maudite jusqu'à ce que la sorcière meure ou que la malédiction soit levée. Le maximum de points de vie de la créature maudite diminue de 5 ({@dice 1d10}) à chaque fois qu'elle termine un long repos.

reaction.name: Dream Eater
entries: Lorsqu'une créature {@condition unconscious} que la sorcière peut voir dans un rayon de 30 pieds autour d'elle reprend conscience, la sorcière peut la forcer à effectuer un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 15}. Si la sauvegarde ne réussit pas, la créature subit 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dégâts psychiques, et la sorcière regagne un nombre de points de vie égal à la quantité de dégâts subis.

trait.name: Alien Mind
entries: Si une créature tente de lire les pensées du Dyrrn ou lui inflige des dégâts psychiques, cette créature doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde d'Intelligence {@dc 23} ou être {@condition stunned} pendant 1 minute. La créature {@condition stunned} peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Si Dyrrn échoue à un jet de sauvegarde, il peut choisir de réussir à la place.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Dyrrn a un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et autres effets magiques.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Dyrrn regagne 20 points de vie au début de son tour. Si Dyrrn subit des dégâts radiants, ce trait ne fonctionne pas au début de son prochain tour. Dyrrn meurt uniquement s'il commence son tour avec 0 point de vie et ne se régénère pas.

trait.name: Teleport
entries: Comme action bonus, le Dyrrn peut se téléporter jusqu'à 30 pieds dans un espace inoccupé qu'il peut voir.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Dyrrn effectue une attaque Fouet à tentacules et utilise une fois sa Corruption. Le Dyrrn peut remplacer son attaque Fouet à tentacules par Extrait de cerveau s'il possède une créature {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Tentacle Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} pour toucher, portée de 10 ft, une cible. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) dégâts tranchants. Si la cible est une créature de taille moyenne ou plus petite, elle est {@condition grappled} (fuite {@dc 23}), attirée dans un espace inoccupé à moins de 1,5 m de Dyrrn, et doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde d'Intelligence {@dc 23} ou être {@condition stunned} jusqu'à la fin de ce grappin. Dyrrn ne peut pas utiliser le même fouet à tentacules sur une autre cible jusqu'à ce que ce grappin prenne fin. Le Dyrrn possède deux fouets à tentacules.

action.name: Corruption
entries: Dyrrn cible une créature qu'il peut voir dans un rayon de 60 pieds autour de lui. La cible doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Constitution {@dc 23} ou subir 22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) dégâts nécrotiques et être corrompue pendant 1 minute.

La chair d'une créature corrompue se tord de façon étrange. La créature a un désavantage aux jets d'attaque, sa vitesse est réduite de moitié, et si elle tente de lancer un sort, elle doit d'abord réussir un test d'Intelligence {@dc 15} ou le sort échoue et est gaspillé. La créature corrompue peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} pour toucher, portée de 5 ft, une {@condition incapacitated} créature {@condition grappled} par Dyrrn. {@h}55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dégâts perforants. Si ces dégâts réduisent la cible à 0 point de vie, Dyrrn la tue en extrayant et en dévorant son cerveau.

legendary.name: Tentacle Whip
entries: Dyrrn fait une attaque avec son fouet à tentacules.

legendary.name: Spawn Aberration (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Dyrrn régurgite un dévoreur d'intellect dans un espace inoccupé situé à moins de 1,5 mètre de lui. Le dévoreur d'intellect est sous le contrôle de Dyrrn et agit immédiatement après Dyrrn dans l'ordre d'initiative.

legendary.name: Mind Blast (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Dyrrn émet magiquement de l'énergie psychique dans un cône de 60 pieds. Chaque créature dans cette zone doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde d'Intelligence {@dc 23} ou subir 30 ({@damage 5d8 + 8}) dégâts psychiques et être {@condition stunned} pendant 1 minute. Une créature peut répéter le jet de sauvegarde à la fin de chacun de ses tours, mettant fin à l'effet sur elle-même en cas de réussite.

monster.name: Expeditious Messenger
languages: one language spoken by its creator

trait.name: Flyby
entries: Le messager ne provoque pas d'attaque d'opportunité lorsqu'il vole hors de portée d'un ennemi.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: Bien que le messager soit sur le même plan d'existence que son maître, il peut transmettre magiquement ce qu'il ressent à son maître, et les deux peuvent communiquer par télépathie.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) dégâts perforants.

trait.name: Quickness {@recharge 5}
entries: Le fastidieux peut effectuer l'action Esquive comme une action bonus.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) dégâts perforants.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: La capacité de lancement de sorts du quori est l'Intelligence (sauvegarde contre les sorts {@dc 16}). Il peut lancer de manière innée les sorts suivants, qui ne nécessitent aucun composant :

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Le quori utilise deux fois son Mind Thrust.

action.name: Idyllic Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) dégâts de force. Si la cible est une créature, elle doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 16} ou tomber {@condition prone} dans une crise de fou rire.

action.name: Mind Thrust
entries: Le quori cible une créature qu'il peut voir dans un rayon de 60 pieds autour de lui. La cible doit effectuer un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 16} et subit 18 ({@damage 4d8}) dégâts psychiques en cas d'échec, ou la moitié des dégâts en cas de réussite.

action.name: Possession {@recharge}
entries: Un humanoïde que le quori peut voir à moins de 1,5 m de lui doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Charisme de {@dc 16} ou être possédé par le quori ; le quori disparaît alors, et la cible est {@condition incapacitated} et perd le contrôle de son corps. Le quori contrôle désormais le corps mais ne prive pas la cible de sa conscience. Le quori ne peut être ciblé par aucune attaque, aucun sort ni aucun autre effet, et il conserve son alignement, son Intelligence, sa Sagesse, son Charisme et son immunité à être {@condition charmed} et {@condition frightened}. Il utilise par ailleurs les statistiques de la cible possédée, mais n'a pas accès aux connaissances, aux caractéristiques de classe ou aux compétences de la cible.

La possession dure jusqu'à ce que le corps tombe à 0 point de vie, que le quori y mette fin par une action bonus, ou que le quori soit forcé de sortir par un effet comme le sort {@spell dispel evil and good}. Lorsque la possession prend fin, le quori réapparaît dans un espace inoccupé à moins de 1,5 mètre du corps. La cible est immunisée contre la possession de ce quori pendant 24 heures après avoir réussi le jet de sauvegarde ou après la fin de la possession.

reaction.name: Empathic Feedback
entries: Lorsque le quori subit des dégâts de la part d'une créature qu'il peut voir à moins de 60 pieds de lui, il peut forcer cette créature à réussir un jet de sauvegarde d'Intelligence {@dc 16} ou à subir 11 ({@damage 2d10}) dégâts psychiques.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: La capacité de lanceur de sorts de l'Inspiré est l'Intelligence (sauvegarde contre les sorts {@dc 13}). Il peut lancer de manière innée les sorts suivants, ne nécessitant aucun composant matériel :

trait.name: Dual Mind
entries: L'Inspiré a l'avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde de Sagesse.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: L'Inspiré effectue deux attaques de dague de cristal. Il peut remplacer une attaque par une moquerie vicieuse.

action.name: Crysteel Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) dégâts perforants plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) dégâts de force.

action.name: Vicious Mockery (Cantrip)
entries: L'Inspiré déchaîne une série d'insultes parsemées de subtils enchantements sur une créature qu'il peut voir dans un rayon de 60 pieds autour de lui. Si la cible peut entendre l'Inspiré, elle doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de Sagesse {@dc 13} ou subir 2 ({@damage 1d4}) dégâts psychiques et avoir un désavantage au prochain jet d'attaque qu'elle fera avant la fin de son prochain tour.

variant.name: Quori Vessel
entries: Les inspirés sont des vaisseaux pour les esprits quoris, permettant aux quoris de manifester une partie de leur pouvoir pendant que le vaisseau est possédé. Un Inspiré peut obtenir des avantages en fonction du type de quori qui le possède. Le quori a également accès aux connaissances et aux caractéristiques de l'Inspiré.

entries.name: Suggestion (3/Day)
entries: L'Inspiré peut lancer le sort {@spell suggestion} (sauvegarde du sort {@dc 13}), ne nécessitant aucun composant matériel.

entries.name: All Around Vision
entries: L'Inspiré ne peut pas être surpris.

entries.name: Arcane Eye (3/Day)
entries: L'Inspiré peut lancer le sort {@spell arcane eye}, ne nécessitant aucun composant matériel.

entries.name: Fear (1/Day)
entries: L'Inspiré peut lancer le sort {@spell fear} (sauvegarde du sort {@dc 13}), ne nécessitant aucun composant matériel.

items.name: All Around Vision
entries: L'Inspiré ne peut pas être surpris.

monster.name: Iron Defender
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: Le défenseur a un avantage sur les tests de Sagesse (Perception).

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: Si le défenseur se trouve sur le même plan d'existence que son maître, il peut transmettre magiquement ce qu'il ressent à son maître, et les deux peuvent communiquer par télépathie.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) dégâts perforants. Si la cible est une créature, elle doit réussir un jet de sauvegarde de {@dc 13} Force ou subir 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dégâts perforants supplémentaires et être {@condition grappled} (s'échapper {@dc 13}). Le défenseur ne peut avoir qu'une seule créature {@condition grappled} de cette façon à la fois.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The quori's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}, {@hit 13} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: All-Around Vision
entries: The quori can't be surprised while it isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The quori can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The quori has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quori makes two Soul Binding attacks. Alternatively, it can make four attacks with Arcane Blast.

action.name: Arcane Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 13} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) force damage.

action.name: Soul Binding
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) necrotic damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points from this attack dies and has its soul imprisoned in one of the quori's eyes. The target can't be revived by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell until the quori is destroyed.

action.name: Mind Seed (1/Day)
entries: The quori touches one humanoid, which must succeed on a {@dc 21} Intelligence saving throw or be cursed. The curse lasts until it's removed by a remove curse or {@spell greater restoration} spell.

The cursed target suffers 1 level of {@condition exhaustion} every 24 hours, and finishing a long rest doesn't reduce its {@condition exhaustion}. If the cursed target reaches {@condition exhaustion} level 6, it doesn't die; it instead becomes a thrall under the quori's control, and all its {@condition exhaustion} is removed. Only the {@spell wish} spell can free the thrall from this control.

action.name: Swarm of Eyes {@recharge}
entries: The quori creates a swarm of spectral eyes that fills a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 45 ({@damage 10d8}) psychic damage, and it is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}. A {@condition blinded} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Possession {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

La possession dure jusqu'à ce que le corps tombe à 0 point de vie, que le quori y mette fin par une action bonus, ou que le quori soit forcé de sortir par un effet comme le sort {@spell dispel evil and good}. Lorsque la possession prend fin, le quori réapparaît dans un espace inoccupé à moins de 1,5 mètre du corps. La cible est immunisée contre la possession de ce quori pendant 24 heures après avoir réussi le jet de sauvegarde ou après la fin de la possession.

trait.name: Dual Mind
entries: The kalashtar has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} pour toucher, portée de 5 ft. ou portée de 20/60 ft., une cible. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) dégâts perforants.

action.name: Mind Thrust
entries: The kalashtar targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The soldier has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the soldier's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the soldier to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the soldier drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The soldier attacks three times with one of its weapons.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The soldier adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the soldier must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Illmarrow is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 23}, {@hit 15} to hit with spell attacks). Illmarrow has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Illmarrow fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Illmarrow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: Illmarrow's body turns to dust when she drops to 0 hit points, and her equipment is left behind. She gains a new body after {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all her hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within two hundred miles of the location at which she was destroyed.

action.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 15} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of Illmarrow's next turn. If the target is undead, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against Illmarrow until the end of her next turn.

action.name: Paralyzing Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Illmarrow exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature can't regain hit points. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

A humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies and rises at the start of Illmarrow's next turn as a zombie. The zombie acts immediately after Illmarrow in the initiative count and is permanently under her command, following her verbal orders.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Illmarrow casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Claw
entries: Illmarrow uses her Paralyzing Claw.

legendary.name: Frightening Presence (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Illmarrow targets up to three creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Illmarrow's Frightening Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Poison Breath (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Illmarrow recharges her Poison Breath and uses it.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Magical Strike
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) fire damage.

action.name: Spell Mimicry {@recharge 5}
entries: The living spell unleashes a thin sheet of flames in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The living spell makes two Magical Strike attacks.

action.name: Magical Strike
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@dice 5d6 + 5}) poison damage.

action.name: Spell Mimicry {@recharge 5}
entries: The living spell creates a 40-foot-diameter sphere of fog within 60 feet of it (the fog spreads around corners). When a creature enters the fog for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The fog moves 10 feet away from the living spell at the start of each of its turns, rolling along the ground and through openings. The fog lasts for 10 minutes or until the living spell's concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The living spell makes two Magical Strike attacks.

action.name: Magical Strike
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) lightning damage.

action.name: Spell Mimicry {@recharge 5}
entries: The living spell unleashes a stroke of lightning in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The magewright's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}). To cast one of its rituals, the magewright must provide additional material components whose value in gold pieces is 20 times the spell's level. These components are consumed when the ritual is finished. The magewright knows the following spells:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

vulnerable.note: from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mordakhesh's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). Mordakhesh can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Mordakhesh can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless he wishes to be. Mordakhesh has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Mordakhesh makes three greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage.

action.name: Chromatic Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@dice 3d8}) damage of a type chosen by Mordakhesh: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Mordakhesh makes one weapon attack or casts {@spell chromatic orb}.

legendary.name: Chromatic Resistance
entries: Modakhesh gains resistance to one damage type of his choice—acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder—until the start of his next turn.

legendary.name: Warlord's Command (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Mordakhesh targets up to two allies that he can see within 30 feet of him. If a target can see and hear him, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The radiant idol's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). The radiant idol can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aura of False Divinity
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the radiant idol must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw, provided the radiant idol isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the radiant idol. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, a creature is immune to this radiant idol's Aura of False Divinity for 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The radiant idol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The radiant idol makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Strike (1/Day)
entries: The radiant idol chooses a point on the ground it can see within 60 feet of it. A 30-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder of bright light appears there until the start of the radiant idol's next turn. Each creature in the cylinder when it appears or that ends its turn there must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rak Tulkhesh's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 24}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Deadly Critical
entries: Rak Tulkhesh scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 and rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Rak Tulkhesh fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Rak Tulkhesh has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Whirlwind of Weapons
entries: A magical aura of weapons surrounds Rak Tulkhesh in a 10 foot radius. At the start of each of his turns, any other creature in the aura takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rak Tulkhesh makes four weapon attacks.

action.name: Spawned Melee Weapon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 3d12 + 9}) force damage.

action.name: Spawned Ranged Weapon
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) force damage.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: Rak Tulkhesh magically polymorphs into a humanoid, beast, or giant that has a challenge rating no higher than his own, or back into his true form. He reverts to his true form if he dies. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (his choice).

In a new form, Rak Tulkhesh retains his alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. His statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Rak Tulkhesh makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: End Magic (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Rak Tulkhesh casts {@spell dispel magic}.

legendary.name: Provoke Rage (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of Rak Tulkhesh must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw or use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against a random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, it makes a ranged weapon attack against a random creature within range, throwing its weapon if necessary. This attack is made with advantage and gains a +4 bonus to the damage roll.

trait.name: Shifting (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the shifter takes on a more bestial form for 1 minute or until it dies. The shifter gains 5 temporary hit points. It can make a bite attack when it activates this trait and also as a bonus action on each of its turns while in its bestial form.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Sul Khatesh's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 26}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Sul Khatesh fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Sul Khatesh has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Master of Magic
entries: Sul Khatesh has advantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Sul Khatesh makes four attacks with Arcane Blast.

action.name: Arcane Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 18} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 1d10 + 10}) force damage.

action.name: Magic Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 5d12 + 4}) force damage.

action.name: Arcane Cataclysm (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Sul Khatesh conjures orbs of magical energy that plummet to the ground at three different points she can see within 1 mile of her. Each creature in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on each point must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 71 ({@damage 11d12}) force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one arcane burst is affected only once. The area of each arcane burst then acts as an {@spell antimagic field} for 1 hour. Sul Khatesh and spells she casts are unaffected by these fields.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: Sul Khatesh magically polymorphs into a humanoid, beast, or giant that has a challenge rating no higher than her own, or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Sul Khatesh's choice).

In a new form, Sul Khatesh retains her alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Her statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Sul Khatesh makes two attacks with her Arcane Blast or one attack with her magic staff.

legendary.name: Consume Magic (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Sul Khatesh targets a creature within 120 feet of her who is concentrating on a spell. The target must succeed on a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw or its concentration is broken on the spell, and Sul Khatesh gains 5 temporary hit points per level of that spell.

legendary.name: Maddening Secrets (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Sul Khatesh whispers an arcane secret into the mind of a creature she can see within 60 feet of her. The target must succeed on a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw or expend one of its spell slots of 3rd level or lower and deal 26 ({@damage 4d12}) force damage to each creature within 30 feet of it. A creature that fails the saving throw but can't expend a spell slot is instead {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The assassin's spellcasting ability is Constitution ({@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Unstable Mark
entries: When the assassin casts an innate spell, each creature within 10 feet of the assassin must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 4 ({@damage 1d8}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

action.name: Chromatic Orb (1/Day)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 90 ft., one creature. {@h}18 ({@dice 4d8}) damage of a type chosen by the assassin: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Lord of Blades is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following artificer spells prepared:

trait.name: Adamantine Plating
entries: Any critical hit against the Lord of Blades becomes a normal hit.

trait.name: Bladed Armor
entries: A creature that grapples the Lord of Blades or is {@condition grappled} by him takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) slashing damage. A creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) slashing damage if it starts its turn grappling or being {@condition grappled} by the Lord of Blades.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the Lord of Blades moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with his adamantine sixblade on the same turn, the target takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Warforged Resilience
entries: The Lord of Blades has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}, is immune to disease, and magic can't put him to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Lord of Blades makes three attacks: two with his adamantine sixblade and one with his bladed wings.

action.name: Adamantine Sixblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage.

action.name: Bladed Wings
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The Lord of Blades makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The Lord of Blades casts one of his cantrips.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Lord of Blades casts a spell of 2nd level or lower from his spell list that takes 1 action to cast.

legendary.name: Blade Dash (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The Lord of Blades moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks, then makes one attack with his adamantine sixblade. He can make one bladed wings attack against each creature he moves past.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The quori's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quori makes three attacks: one pincer attack, one attack with its claws, and one stinger attack.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) if it is a Large or smaller creature. The quori has two pincers, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 4d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the quori for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Possession {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

La possession dure jusqu'à ce que le corps tombe à 0 point de vie, que le quori y mette fin par une action bonus, ou que le quori soit forcé de sortir par un effet comme le sort {@spell dispel evil and good}. Lorsque la possession prend fin, le quori réapparaît dans un espace inoccupé à moins de 1,5 mètre du corps. La cible est immunisée contre la possession de ce quori pendant 24 heures après avoir réussi le jet de sauvegarde ou après la fin de la possession.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The councilor is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Aura of Radiance
entries: The councilor magically sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The councilor can extinguish or restore this light as a bonus action. If the bright light overlaps with an area of darkness created by a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell that created that darkness is dispelled.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The councilor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The councilor makes two Radiant Touch attacks.

action.name: Radiant Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The councilor touches another creature. The target magically regains 18 ({@dice 3d8 + 5}) hit points and is freed from one curse afflicting it (councilor's choice).

action.name: Flame Strike (5th-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: The councilor chooses a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the councilor casts this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the fire damage or the radiant damage (its choice) increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

legendary.name: Touch
entries: The councilor makes one attack with its Radiant Touch.

legendary.name: Shimmering Aura (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The councilor channels positive energy into its Aura of Radiance. Until the end of the councilor's next turn, it sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Any creature that starts its turn in the bright light must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the councilor's next turn.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The soldier magically sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. The soldier can extinguish or restore this light as a bonus action.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The soldier makes two spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage if the target is a fiend or undead.

trait.name: Bonding
entries: The hawk can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the hawk bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the hawk and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Bonding
entries: The hound can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the hound bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the hound and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Bonding
entries: The steed can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the steed bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the steed and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the colossus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The colossus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Towering Terror
entries: Any enemy outside the colossus that starts its turn within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the start of the enemy's next turn. If the enemy's saving throw is successful, it is immune to this colossus's Towering Terror for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The colossus makes three attacks—one with its slam and two with its eldritch turrets—and then uses Stomp.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 3d12 + 10}) bludgeoning damage, and the colossus can push the target up to 20 feet away from it.

action.name: Eldritch Turret
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 18} to hit, range 300 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Stomp
entries: The colossus stomps one of its feet at a point on the ground within 20 feet of it. Any creature in a 20-foot-radius, 20-foot-high cylinder centered on this point must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take 33 ({@damage 6d10}) bludgeoning damage and fall {@condition prone}. Until the colossus uses its Stomp again or moves, the creature is {@condition restrained}. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature (or another creature within 5 feet of it) can use its action to make a {@dc 26} Strength check. On a success, the creature relocates to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the colossus and is no longer {@condition restrained}.
Structures, as well as nonmagical objects that are neither being worn nor carried, take the same amount of damage if they are in the cylinder (no save).

action.name: Incinerating Beam {@recharge 5}
entries: The colossus fires a beam of light in a 150-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 60 ({@damage 11d10}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this beam is disintegrated, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Warforged Resilience
entries: The warforged has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put it to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warforged makes two armblade attacks.

action.name: Armblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
entries: When an attacker the warforged can see makes an attack roll against a creature within 5 feet of the warforged, the warforged can impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

monster.name: Warforged Titan
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Platforms
entries: The warforged titan has two platforms built into its chassis. One Medium or smaller creature can ride on each platform without squeezing. To make a melee attack against a target within 5 feet of the warforged, they must use spears or weapons with reach and the target must be Large or larger.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The warforged titan deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warforged titan makes one axehand attack and one hammerfist attack.

action.name: Axehand
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) slashing damage, plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) slashing damage if the target is {@condition prone}.

action.name: Hammerfist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Sweeping Axe {@recharge}
entries: The warforged titan makes a sweep with its axehand, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

vulnerable.note: from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The rakshasa's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 11}). The rakshasa can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The rakshasa can't be affected or detected by spells of 1st level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The rakshasa's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Martial Prowess (1/Turn)
entries: When the rakshasa hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 11 ({@dice 2d10}) damage of the weapon's type, and the creature must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the rakshasa can push the creature up to 10 feet away from it, knock the creature {@condition prone}, or make the creature drop one item it is holding of the rakshasa's choice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rakshasa makes three melee weapon attacks. Alternatively, it can make two ranged attacks with its javelins.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.
